Parameters: The result of a purchase. The value can be @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase#RESOLUTION_SUCCESS_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase#RESOLUTION_FAILURE_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase#RESOLUTION_INVALID_PRODUCT_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase#RESOLUTION_CANCELED_E@
recordResolution(int).Description: Records the purchase status and conversion events. If this method is not called, conversion events will be lost. If the purchase is made fulfilled by Google Play billing, use @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase#recordPlayBillingResolution_E@ instead. The Google Conversion Tracking SDK is required to report conversion events.

Parameters: The result of a play billing purchase. The value can be any billing response code from _E@
recordPlayBillingResolution(int).Description: Records the purchase status and conversion events for a play billing purchase. If this method is not called, conversion events will be lost. If the purchase is made fulfilled by a billing service other than Google Play billing, use @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase#recordResolution_E@ instead. The Google Conversion Tracking SDK is required to report conversion events.
